SELECT DISTINCT E.EMP_EMNO AS empEmno /*사원번호*/ , E.EMP_NAME AS empName /*사원이름*/ , E.RANK_CODE AS rankCode /*직위/직급코드*/ , E.DEPT_CODE AS depCode /*부서코드*/ , E.EMP_ANL AS empAnl /*연차*/ FROM COMM_STM C LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_EMNO = E.EMP_EMNO WHERE 1=1
AND SUBSTRING(C.COST_WRK_IN, 1, 6) = REPLACE(#{workYyMm}, '-', '')
